body_html: All our CI machines are on ubuntu 16.04. But I think the concern is the CPU docker images are still based off of ubuntu 14.04, while the base image for CUDA enabled packages are ubuntu 16.04

body: All our CI machines are on ubuntu 16.04. But I think the concern is the CPU docker images are still based off of ubuntu 14.04, while the base image for CUDA enabled packages are ubuntu 16.04
